summary: The son of the sheik and a dancing girl fall in love, but when he is made to believe she has betrayed him he seeks revenge.
cast: Rudolph Valentino|Vilma Bánky|George Fawcett|Montagu Love|Karl Dane|Bull Montana|Bynunsky Hyman|Agnes Ayres|Harry Blassingame|Earl Gordon Bostwick|Erwin Connelly|William Donovan|Charles Requa
title: El hijo del caíd
